data.title: Alfred Hitchcock's Silent Film "The Lodger" with LIVE Organ
data.meta_description: Join us for a special presentation of Alfred Hitchcock's 1927 silent film The Lodger accompanied by live organ music performed by the legendary Jay Warren!
data.text:
Join us for a special presentation of Alfred Hitchcock's 1927 silent film The Lodger accompanied by live organ music performed by the legendary Jay Warren!

This haunting silent thriller tells the tale of a mysterious young man (idol Ivor Novello) who takes up residence at a London boardinghouse just as a killer known as the Avenger descends upon the city, preying on blonde women. The film is Hitchcock's first thriller, showcasing many of the themes of Hitchcock's previous and future iconic works.
